data.name: Miguel Angel Huamán
data.Profile: I used to work in civil construction, but one day I learned to program apps and websites. I have never been the same person since. The pandemic allowed me to rethink what I wanted in life. So I decided to leave my career in civil construction to become a developer.

certificate.description: Scholarship. The program developed skills in the creation of new ventures and expand your knowledge in digital transformation and programming.
certificate.name: Frontend Developer

Academic.description: Scholarship. This program developed my skills in the creation of new ventures and expand my knowledge on digital transformation and programming.

Academic.degree: Reto para Dominar el Arte de Hablar en Público
Academic.description: Workshop. I learned storytelling techniques to captivate the audience.
Computational thinking is the process of approaching a problem in a systematic manner and creating and expressing a solution such that it can be carried out by a computer.
I used to write for machines. But in that workshop I learned to write for people.

experience.jobDescription: Expert with Microsoft No-Code tools, like Power Apps and Power Automate.

interest: Philosophy. Because philosophy is often concerned with is to make explicit what has always been implicit in our thinking and acting.
Blockchain. This technology can provide secure transactions, reduce compliance costs, and speed up data transfer processing. Its awesome!
AI ethics. AI needs philosophy to prevent existential risks for humanity, and to solve any issues related to bias.
Smart Contracts. I love the idead of removing intermediaries and allow the end user to interact directly with the ledger.
